[cha:free-documentation-license] entitled “GNU Free Documentation

.. [1]
   Note that it appears that this is the number of terms *beyond* the
   first term that are used. I.e. there are a total of
   :math:`\var{terms_used}+1` terms:
 
..   .. math::
..
..      \var{sum_plain} = 
..            \sum_{n=0}^{\var{terms_used}}
..            a_{n}
